Description: Spacious 4 Queen size bedrooms 1 bath duplex, checks all the boxes! Located in the heart of Southie, features include hardwood floors, fully applianced granite/ss eat-in kitchen, in-unit washer/dryer, central air, ample closet space, high ceilings, private deck and yard! Steps to public transportation and Southies hottest bars & restaurants. Walking distance to the beach and castle island. 24 hour notice required for all showings, unit is occupied. Available 9/1.
